thread.title: Iván

author: Iván
title: Iván
text:
I ordered a pair of Sidi Boots xfire2SRS. Was confused about the size decision after having check the Sidi´s sizing chart, it runs short apparently. ( I have 27cm footlength= Japanese size so I normally fit myself between 42-43 EU but Sidi´s sizing says I should order a 44EU. After reading several reviews, thanks God I didn´t).
Here is my income. Took it from the label inside my boots:
43EU=9UK=9,5US=27JAP.
Hope It helps!
I ordered from Spain and everything was fine, the delivery was after 5 days aprox.
